page.title: 11ASDA SUPERSTORE.
page.content: CUSTOMER SURVEY. {Random sample of 100 customers. {Figures as percentages. } Regular weekly visits.............. 55 Regular monthly visits............. 14 No regular pattern................. 24 Tourist trade ..................... 7 Live within 5 mile radius.......... 76 5 - 15 mile radius ................ 19 More than 15 (including Tourists).. 5 Private transport.................. 85 Public transport................... 1 Asda Free Bus...................... 8 Others (including walking)......... 6 Purchases {FOOD}...................100 Purchases {ELECTRICAL GOODS}....... 18 Purchases{ GARDENING}.............. 23 Purchases{ MOTORING}............... 20
